title: Analyze Blasting Vibration Data
description: After a blast, an engineer analyzes the data from vibration monitors to ensure the blast complied with environmental limits.

tasks.description: Download the vibration data from the monitors placed near sensitive structures (like a nearby town).
tasks.expected_outcome: The vibration data for the blast is retrieved.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to find the peak particle velocity (PPV) at each monitor location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The peak vibration levels are determined.

tasks.description: Compare the measured PPV against the legal compliance limit. Generate a report confirming the blast was compliant.
tasks.expected_outcome: The blast is confirmed to be compliant, and a report is generated for record-keeping.
